Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone!
Reviews.Author: Addy
Reviews.Content: This phone is one of the best I've owned! It functions nicely and I love the full html browser. The features are very nice as well, including the 3MP camera which even zooms in and out. The only downside is using the stylus BUT it just makes you more aware of spelling and grammer as you text. I'd recommend this phone because its great and I love mine.

Reviews.Title: Huawei M735
Reviews.Author: Lizzy83
Reviews.Content: Love the Phone!One thing Why don't you guys List the Color..I don't think all Females Like Blue.I thought it was Silver or like a Chrome Color Just add the Color to the Description of the Phone Please.Other then that Phone Works Excellent!

Reviews.Title: Cannot activate was reported as stolen!
Reviews.Author: Sally M.
Reviews.Content: This phone is useless, I cannot activate ite it or use it in any way.  I don't know this phones history but it came to me as a metro phone that was last used under verizon service! what a mess! tried to use it as a mp3 player so i could get some use of it. sucks not even good for that!

Reviews.Title: Okay Phone
Reviews.Author: D. Nelson "Soonerlady"
Reviews.Content: I like the phone and the color but the sound is not very good and the keys are had to type. I don't like using the stick and would prefer to text with my fingers which is difficult.

Reviews.Title: Short lived
Reviews.Author: Christine Odero
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my niece and it just stopped working, barely 2 months after she received it. This was definitely a waste of money. If I could do it again I would have bought the phone at the Metro store to take advantage of any exchange options.

Reviews.Title: used to be phone
Reviews.Author: josee
Reviews.Content: like the phone but cant get it activated due to no service in my area.so it has to go back,to bad is realy a nicephone and easy to work

Reviews.Title: Item couldn't be shipped to Colorado, but took too long to find out
Reviews.Author: Theresa A. Thibou "T-lady"
Reviews.Content: The supplier for some reason could not ship this item to Colorado Springs but didn't tell me that for several days and after an inquiry, so the product had to be shipped to Atlanta GA and I had to have a friend mail it to me....This was a big hassle.  If there is an area they can't mail too then say so.  But the phone works nicely I bought it as a gift for my brother and he loves it because his old phone was very dated....

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Rogina Rivers
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my Uncle, he loves it... It was affordable, everything works as advertised and his bill dropped from $50 to $37. Cool Beams :)

Reviews.Title: A tank - just like my old Nokia 3310 (which still looks new)
Reviews.Author: Jeff Budkoski
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone when we migrated to MetroPCS from T-Mobile, who now owns MetroPCS.  Used mostly for business.  I have dropped this phone off the roofs of houses I worked on, dropped it on a concrete driveway and watched it slide down the hill face down, run over the corner of it, dropped it in a mud puddle and in various water puddles and it still works fine. I've even tossed it when it froze up one day while I was having to send multiple texts and saw it bounce off a concrete splash block but in putting it back together, it still works.  You can hardly tell its been through all that wear and tear except for a few dimples in the case.I like all the easily accessible features - calender, email, vmail, SMS, MMS for getting my work done.  Simple to use.  Now that its getting older you have to use the stylus more often.  The camera stinks although its good enough for my work - I have to take several shots and then pick from a photo editor.  It freezes every once in a while but reboots quickly.

Reviews.Title: Disapointed
Reviews.Author: Ruth
Reviews.Content: this phone is okay but can be cumbersome to use. It also has no apps that are free. You have to pay for everything even the simple games that come along with every other phone I have had before even the cheap ones. I'm actually pretty disappointed with it. I overpaid for it and found out that I could have gotten the android of this brand for a lot cheaper and it is a better phone.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: cesar
Reviews.Content: i but this phone  on civer Monday 5 days later they didn't send yet the phone what happen with this people

Reviews.Title: Good for kids.
Reviews.Author: Mandy K
Reviews.Content: User friendly.  Pretty sturdy.Got it for my 12 year old, but I wouldn't want it myself.Would be better if you could reset the key size- my kid has tiny hands and still has trouble with the touch screen calibration not "taking".

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: marcelle
Reviews.Content: One of my concerns about going with this phone was whether or not it would have me tearing out my hear in fraustration. I am pleased to say that I do not regret this. occasionally when texting its easy to accidentally hit the key below that which I was aiming for because the touch screen key board is not the largest. At the same time it works, the internet is faster than that which I was using before. THis is a good first try for my first touch screen.

Reviews.Title: he hates this phone
Reviews.Author: Shoneita Heflin "mamashon"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my son and there have been problems with it from day one with getting it activated to it freezing to now the screen has stopped working so now if the screen doesn't work he can't use his phone. He said he like his LG Beacon better too bad the charging port broke on.

Reviews.Title: surprize
Reviews.Author: ccb
Reviews.Content: The Huawei M735, this phone is worth the money, it was easy to learn how it works. [thin and smart looking.]

Reviews.Title: Did I buy a stolen phone?
Reviews.Author: sarah
Reviews.Content: It's not the phones fault that it sucks...I do believe it's the person selling it that sucked...it wasn't set back to to factory setting and the phones memory is full so I cannot send picture messages. I cannot reset the phone my self since I don't know the phone code... I learned and important lesson...never buy a used phone off the internet! I think if I would have bought this phone brand new I would totally love it...

ProductInfo.Features:
Stylish touchscreen phone with 2.8-inch resistive display
Enjoy talk-all-you-want service with no annual contracts via affordable, flexible MetroPCS rate plans
GPS for navigation; 3-MP camera for still photos; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD expansion; MP3 music player
Up to 6.5 hours of talk time, up to 350 hours (14.5 days) of standby time; released in January, 2011
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, charger, stylus, quick start guide
ProductInfo.Name: Huawei M735 Prepaid Phone (MetroPCS)
